item.title: Meshtastic and Device Drivers not available for Windows on ARM
item.description: It’s kind of unfortunate, but I’ve run into a problem several times flashing Meshtastic devices using a Windows on ARM computer. It seems these drivers either don’t exist, or aren’t available for automatic download via Windows Update. My only solution so far as been to switch to a Windows device running on x86_64.

item.title: Digital life organization
item.description: Equipment declutter Things that no longer serve me do not deserve space in my life. They should serve others or be recycled. Clearing the data off of equipment to be retired is easier when that equipement is newer. Allowing old batteries to age in place benefits no one. Digital declutter Holding data represents risk and reward. Holding data I no longer need represents risk without reward. Online footprint Accounts that are not in use represent a risk and are likely to be taken over.
